info.description: This is a flow-analyzer api description
info.title: flow-analyzer

get.summary: Get the list of all available reports and their filters.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A security token used to authenticate a user request.

parameters.name: start-time
parameters.description: Date and time start in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end-time
parameters.description: Date and time end in the form (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: src-port
parameters.description: TCP/UDP source port number separated by coma. Ranges identified by .. Examples: [53, 80, 443, 1000..2000]

parameters.name: dst-port
parameters.description: TCP/UDP destination port number separated by coma. Ranges identified by .. Examples: [53, 80, 443, 1000..2000]

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: One of the columns to sort a report.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sorting order of a report sorted by some column. Values can be either ascending or descending. Must by used with orderby parameter.

get.summary: Gets a list of stored queries
Gets a list of user profiles
Get full configuration list, with groups and subgroups
get.description: Return full structure of configuration, with it\'s groups and subgroups

post.description: Update subgroup of group in configuration

get.summary: Get subgroup configuration by resource name
get.description: Return subgroup structure by resource name

delete.description: Delete exact single parameter identified by it's key/name

post.description: Update exact single parameter identified by it's key/name

requestBody.description: Subgroup config with one paramater and it's value

get.description: Return parameter from subgroup by it's name
